And Thats Why Youll Hear Johnny CryinThe shantys actual name was not given in Baldurs Gate II Shadows of Amn, this article is using the best applicable line as the title. was a crude sea shanty popular among sailors and buccaneers of Athkatlan docks in the late 14 century DR.
And Thats Why Youll Hear Johnny Cryin could be heard drunkenly performed at the Seas Bounty Tavern in Athkatlas Wave District in the .
